The Thing

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Poster | Key Art

34% • 42% • Horror • 2011 • 1h 42m

Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Joel Edgerton, Ulrich Thomsen
R

Description
Paranoia spreads among a team of Arctic researchers as they battle a deadly alien organism that assumes the shapes of its victims.
